verses.verse: (For the choir director. [A Psalm] of David; for a memorial.) O <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H2363>[hasten<s%>] to <S%H5337>deliver<s%> me; O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> hasten to my <S%H5833>help!<s%>

Let those be <S%H954>ashamed<s%> and <S%H2659>humiliated<s%> Who <S%H1245>seek<s%> my <S%H5315>life;<s%> Let those be <S%H5472>turned<s%> <S%H268>back<s%> and <S%H3637>dishonored<s%> Who <S%H2655>delight<s%> in my <S%H9567>hurt.<s%>
Let those be <S%H7725>turned<s%> <S%H7725>back<s%> <S%H5921>because<s%> <S%H6118><s%> of their <S%H1322>shame<s%> Who <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H1889>"Aha,<s%> <S%H1889>aha!<s%>"

Let <S%H3605>all<s%> who <S%H1245>seek<s%> Thee <S%H7797>rejoice<s%> and be <S%H8055>glad<s%> in Thee; And let those who <S%H157>love<s%> Thy <S%H3444>salvation<s%> <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H8548>continually,<s%> "Let <S%H430>God<s%> be <S%H1431>magnified.<s%>"

But I am <S%H6041>afflicted<s%> and <S%H34>needy;<s%> <S%H2363>Hasten<s%> to me, O <S%H430>God!<s%> Thou art my <S%H5828>help<s%> and my <S%H6403>deliverer;<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> do not <S%H309>delay.<s%>
